    • Method Detail

      • setRegularizationFactor

        public void setRegularizationFactor(double lambda)
        Sets the regularization factor. λ > 0 gives a "regularized" estimate of linear weights which often has superior generalization performance, especially when the dimensionality is high.
        Parameters:
        lambda - regularization factor.

      • setTolerance

        public void setTolerance(double tol)
        Sets the tolerance for BFGS stopping iterations.
        Parameters:
        tol - the tolerance for stopping iterations.

      • setMaxNumIteration

        public void setMaxNumIteration(int maxIter)
        Sets the maximum number of iterations.
        Parameters:
        maxIter - the maximum number of iterations.

        Specified by:
        train in class ClassifierTrainer<double[]>
        Parameters:

        y - the training labels.

        a trained classifier.
